title: PLATO: Assessment phase and community preparation, IoA component
abstractText: This is the Plato bridging element for IoA - and replaces the earlier Aug 2008 submission ST/G003823/1
impactText: This grant defined the exoplanet analysis system for the ESA PLATO design study. PLATO was selected as the ESA M3 mission.
findingsText: This grant defined the exoplanet analysis system for the ESA PLATO design study. PLATO was selected as the ESA M3 mission. Analysis systems have relevance in the healthcare domain. Healthcare
